sentences.en: He framed this question three different ways in search of an answer.
sentences.cn: 为了寻求答案，他以3种不同方式提出了这个问题。

sentences.en: He has had to travel the country in search of work.
sentences.cn: 他不得不走遍全国寻找工作。

sentences.en: Her search for love has often caused her excruciating misery and loneliness.
sentences.cn: 她对爱情的寻觅常常给她带来极大的痛苦和孤独感。

sentences.en: His confronting me forced me to search for the answers.
sentences.cn: 他对我的当面质询迫使我思索如何作答。

sentences.en: I’ve searched high and low (= everywhere ) for my glasses.
It was too dark to search further.
Many people want jobs. They try to search them out every day.
sentences.cn: 许多人都想有份工作。他们每天努力寻找。

sentences.en: Marian retains a restless, youthful spirit, in search of new horizons.
sentences.cn: 玛丽安怀着一颗年轻、不断进取的心去寻求新的天地。

sentences.en: Miserable, and unexpectedly lonely, she went in search of Jean-Paul.
sentences.cn: 内心痛苦、突感寂寞的她去寻找琼－保罗。

sentences.en: People migrate to cities like Jakarta in search of work.
sentences.cn: 人们为找工作而迁移到雅加达这类城市里。

sentences.en: Refugees run hither and thither in search of safety.
sentences.cn: 难民们四处逃奔，寻求安全之所。

sentences.en: Rescue workers are digging through the rubble in search of other victims.
sentences.cn: 救援人员正在废墟中挖掘，以搜寻其他受害者。
这一地区已被彻底搜查过。

sentences.en: They are a lost generation in search of an identity.
sentences.cn: 他们属于迷惘的一代，想要找寻自我。

sentences.en: They drew a blank in their search for the driver.
sentences.cn: 他们四处寻找那个司机，但一无所获。

sentences.en: They trekked from shop to shop in search of white knee-length socks.
sentences.cn: 他们拖着步子从一家商店走到另一家，寻找齐膝的白袜子。

sentences.en: Under TQM principles the search for quality is continuous.
sentences.cn: 在全面质量管理原则下，对质量的追求是持续不断的。

sentences.en: You can search me if you think you're man enough.
sentences.cn: 有胆的话，你可以搜我的身。

phrases.tran_cn: 对分查找；二进位检索；折半查找法；二分搜寻
猎头（等于headhunting）；搜寻高级管理人员（的做法）
寻找工作；职位搜索；工作搜寻
我可不知道：说话者用来暗示（她或他）不能解答刚才被问的问题

trans.tran_en: an attempt to find someone or something

trans.tran_cn: 搜索， 寻找； 搜查
trans.tran_en: an attempt to find someone or something

trans.tran_cn: 搜寻， 搜查； 探索， 调查
trans.tran_en: an attempt to find someone or something
to try to find someone or something by looking very carefully
